programme.title: Beyond Normal
programme.desc: In this intimate portrayal of resilience and self-discovery, professional surfer Becca Speak battles to reclaim her identity and return to the waves after a devastating brain injury suffered during a competition.

programme.title: To Be Frank
programme.desc: To Be Frank explores authenticity and community in surfing via Frank Paine, a 73-year-old South Bay icon.

programme.title: Let's Surf Seriously
programme.desc: Surf like you mean it--grab surfing by the balls and twist them like a crocodile dragging a baby goat to its death! If you're gonna surf, do it for real, it's time. Let's surf seriously!

programme.title: Unsurfed Afghanistan
programme.desc: Unsurfed Afghanistan follows Afridun's journey to find waves in his homeland, across three continents.

programme.title: Noah: The Art of Surfing
programme.desc: Professional surfer Noah Beschen travels to Western Australia and Tahiti alongside filmmaker Andy Woodward to surf beautiful yet powerful waves before returning home to the North Shore of Oahu.

programme.title: The Essence of Surfing
programme.desc: The Essence of Surfing is a riveting surf documentary that gets to the heart of why surfing is the greatest sport in the world. Featuring surfers of all kinds, from the neighborhood grom to some of the greatest surfers to ever live, The Essence of Surfing uncovers what it is about this awesome sport that makes it a necessary part of each of their lives. Shot in the world's most beautiful locations by top notch Cinematographers Erik Ippel and Mike Prickett, this film is sure to hook and inspire anyone looking to get wet and catch some waves.

programme.title: Blissful Surfing
programme.desc: Blissful Surfing has awesome action sequences with great surfers in perfect waves. The surfing by John John Florence, Italo and Bobby Martinez is fantastic. The Blissful Surfing vibe is one of supreme happiness and contentment.

programme.title: Stranger Surfing
programme.desc: Stranger Surfing opens with a huge air flip by Gabriel Medina and the action just gets hotter and hotter. John John launches and pulls a 6 foot rotation air.

programme.title: Girl on Wave
programme.desc: Girl on Wave follows windsurfer Sarah Hauser and documents her journey as a New-Caledonian athlete competing on the American stage of windsurfing. Performing in competitions around the globe, Sarah is leaving a unique mark on the sport.

programme.title: Blissful Surfing
programme.desc: Blissful Surfing has awesome action sequences with great surfers in perfect waves. The surfing by John John Florence, Italo and Bobby Martinez is fantastic. The Blissful Surfing vibe is one of supreme happiness and contentment.

programme.title: And Two If By Sea
programme.desc: The story of iconic professional surfers and identical twins CJ & Damien Hobgood. Their sibling rivalry and struggle to each establish their own identity fueled their careers, but ripped their personal and peripheral relationships apart.

programme.title: 7 Miles of Paradise
programme.desc: The North Shore is a 7 Mile stretch of paradise like no other on Earth. Every year thousands of people flock to the North Shore of Oahu to see the world's best surfers ride arguably the world's best waves. Pro surfers have created their careers, made their livings and even become legends from surfing these shores. Pro surfer Anastasia Ashley will be your tour guide and take you to the places she loves, the places she went as a kid growing up there, and introduce you to the people that always made it feel like home. We will experience and understand why she loves the North Shore, and considers it '7 Miles of Paradise'

programme.title: Caveheart
programme.desc: Mason Ho takes his faithful companion far from their home in Hawaii and into foreign frigid waters in search for medieval liquid caves.

programme.title: Cluster
programme.desc: This is our bookmark. Our full stop. It is an actual document of individuality and modern surfing and living and romping and laughing. Collect it and recollect on it. Here we are now, entertain us. And well take it from there.

programme.title: Lost Atlas
programme.desc: Featuring the original six from Mod Coll and introducing surfing's newest guns. With its emphasis on performance and struck to a soundtrack that veers across all genres, Lost Atlas is the must-see surf film of 2011.

programme.title: Dear Suburbia
programme.desc: An interpretation of our lifestyle, culture, riding waves, and traveling the world.

programme.title: Big Wave Tow-In Invitational
programme.desc: Five of the world's most prolific big wave riders charge 30-foot waves at the center of the big wave universe.

programme.title: Ground Swell: Epic Stories of Monster Waves
programme.desc: Showcasing the most famous big wave spots on the planet and the surfers who tackled them.

programme.title: Ground Swell: Other Side of Fear
programme.desc: An in-depth look at the 2021-22 big wave season through the eyes of legendary surfers.

programme.title: Surfing Morning of the Sun
programme.desc: Stunning contemporary surfing mixed with classic surfing from the 1970's. A inspirational homage to the classic surf films of the 1970's like Morning of the Earth. This is one the finest of its genre and noted for the original score.

programme.title: Not By Chance
programme.desc: Trevor Gordon builds a surfboard in 2 days, sails the Atlantic, and rides waves with it.

programme.title: Surprise Excitement Party
programme.desc: Transworld Surf presents Surprise Excitement Party. Starring Mark Healey, John Florence, Conner Coffin, Parker Coffin, Michel Bourez and many more.

programme.title: Ind Ho Nesia
programme.desc: IND HO NESIA is a taste of our 2024 journey. Mostly surfing, trying to find fun waves, and bumping into go
